subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|はし}}

# that which is constructed to connect two points for the purpose of transportation: a [[bridge]]
#* {{RQ:Shin'yaku Kegonkyō Ongi Shiki|16}}:<ref name="SKOS">{{Shin'yaku Kegonkyō Ongi Shiki}}</ref>
#*: 旋澓 [...] 梁力將反橋也二字'''波之'''
#* {{RQ:Shin'yaku Kegonkyō Ongi Shiki|43}}:<ref name="SKOS"/>
#*: 橋梁 上'''波之'''下宇都波利
# a [[bridge]]-like [[walkway]] or [[corridor]] between two [[building]]s in a [[manor]], [[palace]], [[castle]], or similar structure
# a person who acts as a [[bridge]] between different people: a [[mediator]], a [[go-between]]

subSections.title: Synonyms
